data.title: Pooja Sharma (Nepalese actress)
data.text:
Nepalese actress

Pooja Sharma (born April 30, 1992 in Sindhupalchowk, Nepal[1][2]) is a Nepalese actress, producer and also singer known for her work in the Nepalese film industry. Sharma debuted as an actress in 3 Lovers (2012) where she appeared as a supporting actress.[3] She appeared in the leading role in Madhumash, opposite actor Aaryan Sigdel. Sharma gained recognition after her role in Ajhai Pani.[4][5] The turning point in her career came from the movie Prem Geet, which she co-starred in with Pradeep Khadka. The film was a blockbuster at the box office. Since then, she has starred in Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu opposite Paul Shah, which was also her first production venture. Her next film Ramkahani, a multistarrer directed by Sudarshan Thapa, was also a hit at the box office. With these achievements, she has established herself as a leading actress in Nepali film industry.[6]

Filmography

[edit]

Three lovers (2012) as a supporting role

Madhumash (2013) as lead actress opposite Aryan Sigdel

Ajhai Pani (2015) as Yunisha

Chankhe Shankhe Pankhe (2015)

Prem Geet (2016) as Geet

Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu (2017) as Chhayan also debut as a producer

Mero Best Friend (2017) (special appearance)

Ram Kahani (2018) as Maya

Samhalinchha Kahile Man (2019)

Poi Paryo Kale (2019)[7]

Ma Yesto Geet Gauchu-2 (2022)

Saamjhana Birsana (2022 )

Samalinchha kahile man (2022 )
